descriptionHtml:
Illia is a female Imperial mage who lives in the Darklight Tower along with her mother, witches and Hagravens. I modified little bit Illia\'s stats, looks and fixed some faction issues. Illia should be willing to marry you also now.

Modified stats (boosted):
 - Health 175
- Magicka 300
- Stamina 50
Skills:
- Light Armor 45
- Destruction 75
- Restoration 45
- Conjuration 30
Perks:
- Magicka Recovery 2
- Magic Resistance 2
- Elemental Protection
- Atronach
Spells:
- Frost Atronach
- Frost Cloak
- Frostbite
- Ice Spike
- Ice Storm

Mods for looks
- Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
- Reapers Necromancer Runes Robe http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5875

INSTALL: Just unpack and drop files to skyrim/data folder
author: littleatlas
